text:
Not yet, but there will likely be a pub hangout towards the end of the month - I’ll set a date by next week.

Hoping to do another demo-based meetup at Newspeak house in February (similar to the November one) but currently figuring out how to make funding work - eg. need £££ for pizza and drinks for everyone when we do it at non-pub locations.

Currently debating between setting up a fund on open collective (<https://opencollective.com/>) and scouting for sponsors. Ideally the latter since the former looks like it could get complex with accounting and taxes (even if it’s just everyone pays £5 in and we use it for food).

If anyone knows of companies who might be willing to sponsor a couple meetups a year, send them my way!
